### Compile annual totals for the entire SRSS
```{r include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

dat <-  dat %>% filter(year > 1956) 

## toy data for moving average
time <- 1:200
a <- runif(200, 100, 110)
b <- movavg(a, 10, type = "s")
c <- movavg(a, 25, type = "s")

x <- data.frame(time,a,b,c)

ggplot() +
  geom_point(color = "black", aes(x = time, y = a)) +
  geom_line(color = "red", aes(x = time, y = b)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue", aes(x = time, y = c))
## end toy

annual <- dat %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  mutate(rec.ann = sum(rec, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  mutate(rec3.ann = sum(rec3, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  mutate(rec4.ann = sum(rec4, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  mutate(rec5.ann = sum(rec5, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  mutate(year2 = year + 2) %>%
  mutate(spawn_ann = sum(na.omit(spawn_nat))) %>% 
  ungroup()

yearly <- annual %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(total_rec = sum(rec.ann)) %>% 
  mutate(year2 = year + 2) %>%
  mutate(movAveRec5 = movavg(total_rec, 5, type = "s"))

ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = yearly, color = "black", aes(x = year2, y = total_rec)) +
  geom_line(data = yearly, color = "red", aes(x = year2, y = movAveRec5))

ggplot(yearly) +
    theme_minimal() +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin=1976, xmax=1998, ymin=0, ymax=Inf), 
            fill = "lightgray", alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin=2002, xmax=2007, ymin=0, ymax=Inf), 
              fill = "lightgray", alpha = 0.9) +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin=2013, xmax=2020, ymin=0, ymax=Inf), 
           fill = "lightgray", alpha = 0.9) +  
  geom_line(aes(x = year2, y = total_rec), color = "black", size = .2) +
  geom_point(aes(x = year2, y = total_rec), shape = 21, size = 2.5, fill = "white", colour = "black") +
   geom_line(aes(x = year2, y = movAveRec5), color = "red", size = .2) +
  labs(title = "Total SRSS recruitment and 10-year average across PDO regimes", x =  "First Ocean Year", y = "Total Recruitment") +
  xlim(1957, 2020)

norm_ann <- dat %>%   
  group_by(year) %>% 
  mutate(rec.ann.n = mean(rec_n, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  mutate(rec3.ann.n = mean(rec3_n, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  mutate(rec4.ann.n = mean(rec4_n, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  mutate(rec5.ann.n = mean(rec5_n, na.rm = T))

```

### Calculate summary statistics at the stock level for visualizing spatial variation in 5_Vis_Spatial

```{r}

statsSTK <- 
  dat %>% 
  group_by(stk) %>% 
  summarise(maxSpawn = max(spawn_nat, na.rm = TRUE), # highest single year spawning
            totSpawn = sum(spawn_nat, na.rm = TRUE), # total spawning all years
            aveSpawn = mean(spawn_nat, na.rm = TRUE), # average spawning all years
            firstSpawn = first(na.omit(spawn_nat)), # first recorded year
            lastSpawn = last(na.omit(spawn_nat)), # last recorded year
            diffSpawn = firstSpawn - lastSpawn, # first - last
            firstScale = firstSpawn/aveSpawn, # first, scaled by stock-specific mean
            lastScale = lastSpawn/aveSpawn, # last, scaled by mean
            diffScale = diffSpawn/firstSpawn) # difference scaled by mean

decades <- 
  dat %>% 
  group_by(stk) %>% 
  mutate(decade = floor(year/10)*10) %>% # create deacade indicator var
  ungroup()

decades$decade

decades <- 
  decades %>% 
  group_by(stk,decade) %>% 
  summarize(decSpawn = mean(na.omit(spawn_nat))) # decadal average in spawning

decades <- 
  decades %>% 
  group_by(stk) %>% 
  mutate(maxDec = max(na.omit(decSpawn)), # highest decade
         minDec = min(na.omit(decSpawn)), # lowest decade
         propDec = na.omit(decSpawn)/maxDec) %>%  # proportion (0,1) of highest decade
  ungroup()

length(decades$propDec)

save(statsSTK, file = "Data/statsSTK.RData")
save(decades, file = "Data/decSTK.RData")
```

### Salmon Recruitment by MPG
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
df <- dat %>% 
  select(mpg,stk,year,rec,rec3,rec4,rec5) %>% 
  gather(cohort, number, rec:rec5)

df_n <- dat %>% 
  select(mpg,stk,year,rec_n, rec3_n, rec4_n, rec5_n) %>% 
  gather(cohort, number, rec_n:rec5_n)

df_ann <- df %>% 
  group_by(year, cohort) %>% 
  mutate(ann.total = sum(number, na.rm = T))

df_ann_n <- df_n %>% 
  group_by(year, cohort) %>% 
  mutate(ann.mean = mean(number, na.rm = T))

df_mpg <- df %>% 
  group_by(year, mpg) %>% 
  summarise(ann.total = sum(number, na.rm = T))

df_c_m <- df %>% 
  group_by(year, cohort, mpg) %>% 
  summarise(ann.total = sum(number, na.rm = T))

# df_cohort <- df %>% 
#  group_by(year, Cohort, mpg) %>% 
#  summarise(ann.total = sum(Number, na.rm = T))

pal1 <- pnw_palette(name="Sunset2",type="discrete")
pal2 <- pnw_palette(name="Shuksan2",type="discrete")
pal3 <- pnw_palette(name="Starfish",type="discrete")
pal4 <- pnw_palette(name="Bay",type="discrete")

r2 <- ggplot(df_mpg, aes(x = year, y = ann.total)) +
  geom_line(color = "black", size = .2) +
#  geom_point(shape = 21, size = 1, fill = "white", colour = "black") +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Total recruitment from brood year") +
  facet_wrap(~mpg, scales = "free", nrow = 2)
print (r2)
```

#### - MPGs share common high/low years (eg 1998-1999) but of different magnitudes
#### - But longer term trends vary among MPGS (eg Imnaha vs All Salmon 1960-1970)

### Correlation heatmap of selected variables 
```{r echo=FALSE}

cormat <- round(cor(cov[,3:10], use = "na.or.complete"),2)
reorder_cormat <- function(cormat){
# Use correlation between variables as distance
dd <- as.dist((1-cormat)/2)
hc <- hclust(dd)
cormat <-cormat[hc$order, hc$order]
}

cormat <- reorder_cormat(cormat)

mel_cor <- melt(cormat)


# Get lower triangle of the correlation matrix
  get_lower_tri<-function(cormat){
    cormat[upper.tri(cormat)] <- NA
    return(cormat)
  }
  # Get upper triangle of the correlation matrix
  get_upper_tri <- function(cormat){
    cormat[lower.tri(cormat)]<- NA
    return(cormat)
  }
  
upper_tri <- get_upper_tri(cormat)

melted_cormat <- reshape2::melt(upper_tri, na.rm = TRUE)

c2 <- ggplot(data = melted_cormat, aes(Var2, Var1, fill = value)) +
 geom_tile(color = "white")+
 scale_fill_gradient2(low = "blue", high = "red", mid = "white", 
   midpoint = 0, limit = c(-1,1), space = "Lab", 
   name="Pearson\nCorrelation") +
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, 
    size = 12, hjust = 1), 
    axis.text.y = element_text(size= 12))+
 coord_fixed()

c2 + 
  geom_text(aes(Var2, Var1, label = value), color = "black", size = 4) +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(),
  axis.title.y = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  panel.background = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  legend.justification = c(1, 0),
  legend.position = c(0.6, 0.7),
  legend.direction = "horizontal")+
  guides(fill = guide_colorbar(barwidth = 7, barheight = 1,
                title.position = "top", title.hjust = 0.5)) +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("PDO","Harvest", "Recruits", "Upwelling", "SRKW", "Hatcheries", "Year", "CSL")) +
  scale_y_discrete(labels = c("PDO","Harvest", "Recruits", "Upwelling", "SRKW", "Hatcheries", "Year", "CSL"))

```

#### - Strong positive correlations: Year X CSL, Hatcheries X CSL, Hatcheries X SRKW (!) 
#### - Strong negative correlation: PDO X CSL, PDO X Recruits
#### - Weak but notable: Recruits are positively linked to CSL but negative to SRKW
